product_name: Patagonia Plush Marsupial Fleece Pullover - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The girls' Patagonia Plush Marsupial fleece pullover is a cozy layer that traps heat and keeps her nice and toasty. Features high-pile polyester fleece on the outside with soft brushed fleece inside. Kangaroo pocket keeps her hands warm. Stand-up collar helps block the wind. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: The girls' Patagonia Plush Marsupial fleece pullover is a cozy layer that traps heat and keeps her nice and toasty.
